file.content:
name: Project Initiation Workflow
description: Complete end-to-end project setup with Notion, GitHub, and resource provisioning
version: "1.0.0"

metadata:
  workflow_id: project-initiation
  category: project-management
  estimated_duration: "30-45 minutes"
  required_agents:
    - project-manager-agent
    - notion-agent
    - github-agent
    - resource-agent
  
trigger:
  command: "*create-project"
  required_params:
    - project_type
  optional_params:
    - project_name
    - description
    - team_members

stages:
  - stage: "validation"
    name: "Project Requirements Validation"
    agent: project-manager-agent
    tasks:
      - task: validate_project_requirements
        description: "Validate and gather complete project requirements"
        inputs:
          - project_type
          - project_name
          - description
          - team_members
          - infrastructure_needs
        outputs:
          - validated_requirements
          - project_scope
        error_handling:
          - missing_requirements: "Prompt user for missing information"
          - invalid_type: "Show available project types"
    
  - stage: "notion_setup"
    name: "Notion Database Setup"
    agent: notion-agent
    depends_on: validation
    tasks:
      - task: create_project_entry
        description: "Create project in Notion Projects database"
        inputs:
          - validated_requirements
        outputs:
          - project_id
          - notion_project_url
        
      - task: generate_initial_tasks
        description: "Create initial task breakdown based on project type"
        inputs:
          - project_id
          - project_type
        outputs:
          - task_list
          - task_ids
        
      - task: create_project_documentation
        description: "Create initial project documentation in Notes database"
        inputs:
          - project_id
          - project_scope
        outputs:
          - documentation_id
          - documentation_url

  - stage: "github_setup"
    name: "GitHub Repository Setup"
    agent: github-agent
    depends_on: notion_setup
    condition:
      - github_repo_requested: true
    tasks:
      - task: create_repository
        description: "Create GitHub repository with proper template"
        inputs:
          - project_name
          - project_type
          - description
        outputs:
          - repository_url
          - repository_id
        
      - task: setup_repository_structure
        description: "Initialize repository with template structure"
        inputs:
          - repository_id
          - project_type
        outputs:
          - initial_commit_hash
          - branch_structure
        
      - task: configure_repository_settings
        description: "Set up branch protection, workflows, and integrations"
        inputs:
          - repository_id
        outputs:
          - protection_rules
          - workflow_files
        
      - task: clone_local_repository
        description: "Clone repository to local development environment"
        inputs:
          - repository_url
          - project_name
        outputs:
          - local_path
          - clone_status

  - stage: "resource_provisioning"
    name: "Infrastructure Resource Provisioning"
    agent: resource-agent
    depends_on: notion_setup
    condition:
      - infrastructure_required: true
    tasks:
      - task: assess_resource_requirements
        description: "Analyze infrastructure needs based on project type"
        inputs:
          - project_type
          - infrastructure_needs
          - team_size
        outputs:
          - resource_specification
          - estimated_costs
        
      - task: allocate_resources
        description: "Provision required infrastructure resources"
        inputs:
          - resource_specification
          - project_id
        outputs:
          - allocated_resources
          - resource_endpoints
          - access_credentials
        
      - task: configure_networking
        description: "Set up networking and security for allocated resources"
        inputs:
          - allocated_resources
          - project_security_requirements
        outputs:
          - network_configuration
          - security_settings
        
      - task: setup_monitoring
        description: "Configure monitoring and alerting for resources"
        inputs:
          - allocated_resources
        outputs:
          - monitoring_endpoints
          - alert_configurations

  - stage: "integration"
    name: "Cross-System Integration"
    agent: project-manager-agent
    depends_on: 
      - notion_setup
      - github_setup
      - resource_provisioning
    tasks:
      - task: link_systems
        description: "Create bidirectional links between Notion, GitHub, and resources"
        inputs:
          - project_id
          - repository_url
          - allocated_resources
        outputs:
          - integration_status
          - sync_configuration
        
      - task: setup_automation
        description: "Configure hooks and automation between systems"
        inputs:
          - project_id
          - repository_id
          - allocated_resources
        outputs:
          - hook_configurations
          - automation_status
        
      - task: validate_integration
        description: "Test all integrations and automations"
        inputs:
          - integration_status
          - hook_configurations
        outputs:
          - validation_results
          - integration_health

  - stage: "finalization"
    name: "Project Finalization"
    agent: project-manager-agent
    depends_on: integration
    tasks:
      - task: generate_project_summary
        description: "Create comprehensive project setup summary"
        inputs:
          - project_id
          - notion_project_url
          - repository_url
          - allocated_resources
          - task_list
        outputs:
          - project_summary
          - access_information
          - next_steps
        
      - task: notify_stakeholders
        description: "Send project setup notifications to team members"
        inputs:
          - team_members
          - project_summary
          - access_information
        outputs:
          - notification_status
        
      - task: schedule_kickoff
        description: "Schedule project kickoff meeting and initial planning session"
        inputs:
          - team_members
          - project_timeline
        outputs:
          - kickoff_meeting
          - planning_session

success_criteria:
  - notion_project_created: true
  - github_repository_created: true
  - resources_allocated: true
  - integrations_configured: true
  - team_notified: true

rollback_procedures:
  notion_rollback:
    - Delete created project entry
    - Remove generated tasks
    - Clean up project documentation
  
  github_rollback:
    - Delete created repository
    - Clean up local clone
    - Remove webhook configurations
  
  resource_rollback:
    - Deallocate provisioned resources
    - Clean up network configurations
    - Remove monitoring setup

error_handling:
  agent_failure:
    action: "Continue with other stages, mark failed stage for retry"
    max_retries: 3
    escalation: "Notify project manager for manual intervention"
  
  resource_shortage:
    action: "Queue project for later provisioning"
    notification: "Inform user of delay and expected availability"
  
  integration_failure:
    action: "Complete individual setups, flag integration for manual setup"
    fallback: "Provide manual integration instructions"

monitoring:
  workflow_progress:
    - Stage completion percentage
    - Task execution time
    - Error occurrences
    - Resource utilization
  
  success_metrics:
    - Time to project creation
    - Integration success rate
    - User satisfaction score
    - Resource allocation efficiency

notifications:
  workflow_start:
    recipients: [user, project_manager]
    message: "Project initiation workflow started for {project_name}"
  
  stage_completion:
    recipients: [user]
    message: "Completed {stage_name} for project {project_name}"
  
  workflow_completion:
    recipients: [user, team_members, project_manager]
    message: "Project {project_name} successfully initialized"
    attachments: [project_summary, access_information]
  
  workflow_failure:
    recipients: [user, project_manager]
    message: "Project initiation failed at {failed_stage}"
    attachments: [error_log, rollback_summary]

content.content:
1→name: Development Cycle Workflow
     2→description: Orchestrate complete development cycles from task assignment to deployment
     3→version: "1.0.0"
     4→
     5→metadata:
     6→  workflow_id: development-cycle
     7→  category: development
     8→  estimated_duration: "Variable (1 hour to several days)"
     9→  required_agents:
    10→    - project-manager-agent
    11→    - notion-agent
    12→    - github-agent
    13→    - resource-agent
    14→
    15→trigger:
    16→  command: "*start-development-cycle"
    17→  required_params:
    18→    - project_id
    19→    - cycle_type  # feature, bugfix, release, hotfix
    20→  optional_params:
    21→    - assignee
    22→    - priority
    23→    - deadline
    24→
    25→variables:
    26→  cycle_types:
    27→    feature:
    28→      branch_prefix: "feature/"
    29→      review_requirements: 2
    30→      testing_required: true
    31→      deployment_stage: development
    32→    
    33→    bugfix:
    34→      branch_prefix: "bugfix/"
    35→      review_requirements: 1
    36→      testing_required: true
    37→      deployment_stage: development
    38→    
    39→    release:
    40→      branch_prefix: "release/"
    41→      review_requirements: 3
    42→      testing_required: true
    43→      deployment_stage: staging
    44→    
    45→    hotfix:
    46→      branch_prefix: "hotfix/"
    47→      review_requirements: 2
    48→      testing_required: true
    49→      deployment_stage: production
    50→
    51→stages:
    52→  - stage: "planning"
    53→    name: "Development Planning"
    54→    agent: project-manager-agent
    55→    tasks:
    56→      - task: analyze_requirements
    57→        description: "Analyze task requirements and break down into subtasks"
    58→        inputs:
    59→          - project_id
    60→          - task_description
    61→          - cycle_type
    62→        outputs:
    63→          - task_breakdown
    64→          - estimated_effort
    65→          - dependencies
    66→        
    67→      - task: assign_resources
    68→        description: "Assign team members and allocate resources"
    69→        inputs:
    70→          - task_breakdown
    71→          - team_availability
    72→          - resource_requirements
    73→        outputs:
    74→          - resource_allocation
    75→          - team_assignments
    76→          - timeline
    77→        
    78→      - task: validate_prerequisites
    79→        description: "Ensure all prerequisites are met before development"
    80→        inputs:
    81→          - dependencies
    82→          - resource_allocation
    83→        outputs:
    84→          - prerequisite_status
    85→          - blocking_issues
    86→
    87→  - stage: "environment_setup"
    88→    name: "Development Environment Setup"
    89→    agent: github-agent
    90→    depends_on: planning
    91→    tasks:
    92→      - task: create_feature_branch
    93→        description: "Create development branch from appropriate base"
    94→        inputs:
    95→          - project_repository
    96→          - cycle_type
    97→          - task_name
    98→        outputs:
    99→          - branch_name
   100→          - branch_url
   101→        
   102→      - task: setup_development_environment
   103→        description: "Prepare local development environment"
   104→        inputs:
   105→          - branch_name
   106→          - project_dependencies
   107→        outputs:
   108→          - environment_status
   109→          - setup_instructions
   110→        
   111→      - task: create_pull_request_draft
   112→        description: "Create draft PR for tracking development progress"
   113→        inputs:
   114→          - branch_name
   115→          - task_description
   116→          - task_breakdown
   117→        outputs:
   118→          - pull_request_id
   119→          - pull_request_url
   120→
   121→  - stage: "development"
   122→    name: "Active Development"
   123→    agent: github-agent
   124→    depends_on: environment_setup
   125→    tasks:
   126→      - task: implement_changes
   127→        description: "Execute development work according to requirements"
   128→        inputs:
   129→          - task_breakdown
   130→          - coding_standards
   131→          - architecture_guidelines
   132→        outputs:
   133→          - implementation_status
   134→          - code_metrics
   135→        
   136→      - task: write_tests
   137→        description: "Create comprehensive tests for implemented changes"
   138→        inputs:
   139→          - implementation_status
   140→          - testing_requirements
   141→        outputs:
   142→          - test_coverage
   143→          - test_results
   144→        
   145→      - task: update_documentation
   146→        description: "Update relevant documentation for changes"
   147→        inputs:
   148→          - implementation_status
   149→          - documentation_requirements
   150→        outputs:
   151→          - documentation_updates
   152→          - documentation_status
   153→
   154→  - stage: "quality_assurance"

file.content:
name: Development Cycle Workflow
description: Orchestrate complete development cycles from task assignment to deployment
version: "1.0.0"

metadata:
  workflow_id: development-cycle
  category: development
  estimated_duration: "Variable (1 hour to several days)"
  required_agents:
    - project-manager-agent
    - notion-agent
    - github-agent
    - resource-agent

trigger:
  command: "*start-development-cycle"
  required_params:
    - project_id
    - cycle_type  # feature, bugfix, release, hotfix
  optional_params:
    - assignee
    - priority
    - deadline

variables:
  cycle_types:
    feature:
      branch_prefix: "feature/"
      review_requirements: 2
      testing_required: true
      deployment_stage: development
    
    bugfix:
      branch_prefix: "bugfix/"
      review_requirements: 1
      testing_required: true
      deployment_stage: development
    
    release:
      branch_prefix: "release/"
      review_requirements: 3
      testing_required: true
      deployment_stage: staging
    
    hotfix:
      branch_prefix: "hotfix/"
      review_requirements: 2
      testing_required: true
      deployment_stage: production

stages:
  - stage: "planning"
    name: "Development Planning"
    agent: project-manager-agent
    tasks:
      - task: analyze_requirements
        description: "Analyze task requirements and break down into subtasks"
        inputs:
          - project_id
          - task_description
          - cycle_type
        outputs:
          - task_breakdown
          - estimated_effort
          - dependencies
        
      - task: assign_resources
        description: "Assign team members and allocate resources"
        inputs:
          - task_breakdown
          - team_availability
          - resource_requirements
        outputs:
          - resource_allocation
          - team_assignments
          - timeline
        
      - task: validate_prerequisites
        description: "Ensure all prerequisites are met before development"
        inputs:
          - dependencies
          - resource_allocation
        outputs:
          - prerequisite_status
          - blocking_issues

  - stage: "environment_setup"
    name: "Development Environment Setup"
    agent: github-agent
    depends_on: planning
    tasks:
      - task: create_feature_branch
        description: "Create development branch from appropriate base"
        inputs:
          - project_repository
          - cycle_type
          - task_name
        outputs:
          - branch_name
          - branch_url
        
      - task: setup_development_environment
        description: "Prepare local development environment"
        inputs:
          - branch_name
          - project_dependencies
        outputs:
          - environment_status
          - setup_instructions
        
      - task: create_pull_request_draft
        description: "Create draft PR for tracking development progress"
        inputs:
          - branch_name
          - task_description
          - task_breakdown
        outputs:
          - pull_request_id
          - pull_request_url

  - stage: "development"
    name: "Active Development"
    agent: github-agent
    depends_on: environment_setup
    tasks:
      - task: implement_changes
        description: "Execute development work according to requirements"
        inputs:
          - task_breakdown
          - coding_standards
          - architecture_guidelines
        outputs:
          - implementation_status
          - code_metrics
        
      - task: write_tests
        description: "Create comprehensive tests for implemented changes"
        inputs:
          - implementation_status
          - testing_requirements
        outputs:
          - test_coverage
          - test_results
        
      - task: update_documentation
        description: "Update relevant documentation for changes"
        inputs:
          - implementation_status
          - documentation_requirements
        outputs:
          - documentation_updates
          - documentation_status

  - stage: "quality_assurance"
    name: "Quality Assurance"
    agent: github-agent
    depends_on: development
    tasks:
      - task: run_automated_tests
        description: "Execute full test suite and quality checks"
        inputs:
          - test_coverage
          - quality_gates
        outputs:
          - test_results
          - quality_metrics
          - security_scan_results
        
      - task: code_review_preparation
        description: "Prepare code for peer review"
        inputs:
          - implementation_status
          - coding_standards
        outputs:
          - review_checklist
          - code_analysis
        
      - task: update_pull_request
        description: "Convert draft PR to ready for review"
        inputs:
          - pull_request_id
          - test_results
          - documentation_updates
        outputs:
          - review_ready_status
          - review_assignments

  - stage: "review_and_approval"
    name: "Code Review and Approval"
    agent: project-manager-agent
    depends_on: quality_assurance
    tasks:
      - task: coordinate_reviews
        description: "Manage code review process and approvals"
        inputs:
          - pull_request_id
          - review_requirements
          - review_assignments
        outputs:
          - review_status
          - approval_status
          - feedback_summary
        
      - task: address_feedback
        description: "Coordinate addressing review feedback"
        inputs:
          - feedback_summary
          - review_status
        outputs:
          - feedback_resolution
          - updated_implementation
        
      - task: final_approval
        description: "Obtain final approval for merge"
        inputs:
          - approval_status
          - quality_metrics
        outputs:
          - merge_approval
          - deployment_clearance

  - stage: "integration"
    name: "Code Integration"
    agent: github-agent
    depends_on: review_and_approval
    tasks:
      - task: merge_changes
        description: "Merge approved changes to target branch"
        inputs:
          - pull_request_id
          - merge_approval
          - target_branch
        outputs:
          - merge_status
          - merge_commit_hash
        
      - task: run_integration_tests
        description: "Execute integration tests after merge"
        inputs:
          - merge_commit_hash
          - integration_test_suite
        outputs:
          - integration_test_results
          - build_status
        
      - task: tag_release
        description: "Create release tag if applicable"
        inputs:
          - cycle_type
          - merge_commit_hash
          - version_number
        outputs:
          - release_tag
          - release_notes
        condition:
          - cycle_type: ["release", "hotfix"]

  - stage: "deployment"
    name: "Deployment and Verification"
    agent: resource-agent
    depends_on: integration
    tasks:
      - task: deploy_to_environment
        description: "Deploy changes to appropriate environment"
        inputs:
          - deployment_stage
          - merge_commit_hash
          - deployment_configuration
        outputs:
          - deployment_status
          - deployment_url
          - deployment_logs
        
      - task: run_smoke_tests
        description: "Execute smoke tests in deployed environment"
        inputs:
          - deployment_url
          - smoke_test_suite
        outputs:
          - smoke_test_results
          - environment_health
        
      - task: monitor_deployment
        description: "Monitor deployment health and performance"
        inputs:
          - deployment_url
          - monitoring_configuration
        outputs:
          - performance_metrics
          - error_rates
          - health_status

  - stage: "completion"
    name: "Cycle Completion"
    agent: project-manager-agent
    depends_on: deployment
    tasks:
      - task: update_project_status
        description: "Update project and task status in Notion"
        inputs:
          - project_id
          - task_ids
          - deployment_status
        outputs:
          - notion_updates
          - project_progress
        
      - task: generate_cycle_report
        description: "Create development cycle completion report"
        inputs:
          - cycle_metrics
          - deployment_status
          - team_performance
        outputs:
          - cycle_report
          - lessons_learned
        
      - task: cleanup_resources
        description: "Clean up temporary resources and environments"
        inputs:
          - temporary_resources
          - cleanup_configuration
        outputs:
          - cleanup_status
          - resource_savings
        
      - task: notify_stakeholders
        description: "Notify relevant stakeholders of completion"
        inputs:
          - stakeholder_list
          - cycle_report
          - deployment_url
        outputs:
          - notification_status

quality_gates:
  code_quality:
    - test_coverage: ">= 80%"
    - linting_errors: "= 0"
    - security_vulnerabilities: "= 0"
    - code_duplication: "< 5%"
  
  performance:
    - build_time: "< 10 minutes"
    - deployment_time: "< 5 minutes"
    - response_time: "< 200ms"
    - memory_usage: "< baseline + 10%"
  
  process:
    - code_reviews: ">= required_reviewers"
    - documentation_updated: "= true"
    - tests_passing: "= 100%"
    - approvals_obtained: "= true"

rollback_procedures:
  development_rollback:
    - Revert commits to last stable state
    - Clean up feature branches
    - Reset development environment
  
  deployment_rollback:
    - Trigger automated rollback procedure
    - Restore previous version
    - Verify rollback success
    - Update monitoring and alerts
  
  database_rollback:
    - Execute database migration rollback
    - Restore data consistency
    - Validate data integrity

error_handling:
  test_failures:
    action: "Block progression, require fixes"
    notification: "Alert development team and project manager"
    
  deployment_failures:
    action: "Initiate rollback procedure"
    escalation: "Page on-call engineer"
    
  quality_gate_failures:
    action: "Return to previous stage for remediation"
    notification: "Send quality report to team lead"

monitoring_and_metrics:
  cycle_metrics:
    - Cycle time (planning to deployment)
    - Lead time (request to delivery)
    - Code quality metrics
    - Deployment success rate
    - Rollback frequency
  
  team_performance:
    - Code review turnaround time
    - Test coverage trends
    - Bug introduction rate
    - Feature delivery velocity
  
  system_health:
    - Application performance
    - Error rates
    - Resource utilization
    - User satisfaction

notifications:
  cycle_start:
    recipients: [assignee, project_manager, team_lead]
    message: "Development cycle started for {task_name}"
  
  quality_gate_passed:
    recipients: [assignee, reviewers]
    message: "Quality gates passed for {task_name}"
  
  deployment_success:
    recipients: [team, stakeholders]
    message: "Successfully deployed {task_name} to {environment}"
  
  cycle_completion:
    recipients: [project_manager, stakeholders]
    message: "Development cycle completed for {task_name}"
    attachments: [cycle_report, performance_metrics]

1→name: Infrastructure Setup Workflow
     2→description: Comprehensive infrastructure provisioning and configuration for projects
     3→version: "1.0.0"
     4→
     5→metadata:
     6→  workflow_id: infrastructure-setup
     7→  category: infrastructure
     8→  estimated_duration: "45-90 minutes"
     9→  required_agents:
    10→    - resource-agent
    11→    - project-manager-agent
    12→    - notion-agent
    13→  optional_agents:
    14→    - github-agent
    15→
    16→trigger:
    17→  command: "*provision-infrastructure"
    18→  required_params:
    19→    - project_id
    20→    - infrastructure_type
    21→  optional_params:
    22→    - environment_type  # development, staging, production
    23→    - scaling_requirements
    24→    - compliance_requirements
    25→
    26→variables:
    27→  infrastructure_types:
    28→    web_application:
    29→      components:
    30→        - web_servers: 2
    31→        - database_server: 1
    32→        - load_balancer: 1
    33→        - cache_server: 1
    34→      resources:
    35→        web_server: { cpu: 2, ram: "4GB", storage: "50GB" }
    36→        database_server: { cpu: 4, ram: "8GB", storage: "100GB" }
    37→        load_balancer: { cpu: 1, ram: "2GB", storage: "20GB" }
    38→        cache_server: { cpu: 2, ram: "4GB", storage: "30GB" }
    39→    
    40→    api_service:
    41→      components:
    42→        - api_servers: 3
    43→        - database_server: 1
    44→        - message_queue: 1
    45→        - monitoring_stack: 1
    46→      resources:
    47→        api_server: { cpu: 2, ram: "2GB", storage: "30GB" }
    48→        database_server: { cpu: 4, ram: "8GB", storage: "100GB" }
    49→        message_queue: { cpu: 2, ram: "4GB", storage: "50GB" }
    50→        monitoring_stack: { cpu: 2, ram: "4GB", storage: "100GB" }
    51→    
    52→    data_pipeline:
    53→      components:
    54→        - processing_nodes: 4
    55→        - database_cluster: 3
    56→        - storage_cluster: 1
    57→        - scheduler: 1
    58→      resources:
    59→        processing_node: { cpu: 8, ram: "16GB", storage: "200GB" }
    60→        database_node: { cpu: 4, ram: "8GB", storage: "500GB" }
    61→        storage_cluster: { cpu: 2, ram: "4GB", storage: "2TB" }
    62→        scheduler: { cpu: 2, ram: "4GB", storage: "50GB" }
    63→
    64→stages:
    65→  - stage: "requirements_analysis"
    66→    name: "Infrastructure Requirements Analysis"
    67→    agent: resource-agent
    68→    tasks:
    69→      - task: analyze_project_requirements
    70→        description: "Analyze project needs and determine infrastructure specifications"
    71→        inputs:
    72→          - project_id
    73→          - infrastructure_type
    74→          - expected_load
    75→          - compliance_requirements
    76→        outputs:
    77→          - infrastructure_specification
    78→          - resource_requirements
    79→          - cost_estimate
    80→        
    81→      - task: validate_resource_availability
    82→        description: "Check availability of required resources"
    83→        inputs:
    84→          - resource_requirements
    85→          - preferred_locations
    86→        outputs:
    87→          - availability_status
    88→          - alternative_options
    89→          - resource_constraints
    90→        
    91→      - task: create_architecture_design
    92→        description: "Design infrastructure architecture and topology"
    93→        inputs:
    94→          - infrastructure_specification
    95→          - availability_status
    96→          - security_requirements
    97→        outputs:
    98→          - architecture_diagram
    99→          - component_specifications
   100→          - network_topology
   101→
   102→  - stage: "resource_allocation"
   103→    name: "Resource Allocation and Reservation"
   104→    agent: resource-agent
   105→    depends_on: requirements_analysis
   106→    tasks:
   107→      - task: reserve_compute_resources
   108→        description: "Reserve virtual machines and containers"
   109→        inputs:
   110→          - component_specifications
   111→          - resource_requirements
   112→        outputs:
   113→          - reserved_resources
   114→          - resource_ids
   115→          - allocation_confirmation
   116→        
   117→      - task: allocate_storage
   118→        description: "Allocate and configure storage resources"
   119→        inputs:
   120→          - storage_requirements
   121→          - backup_requirements
   122→        outputs:
   123→          - storage_allocations
   124→          - storage_endpoints
   125→          - backup_configuration
   126→        
   127→      - task: configure_networking
   128→        description: "Set up network infrastructure and security groups"
   129→        inputs:
   130→          - network_topology
   131→          - security_requirements
   132→        outputs:
   133→          - network_configuration
   134→          - security_groups
   135→          - firewall_rules
   136→        
   137→      - task: reserve_ip_addresses
   138→        description: "Allocate IP addresses and configure DNS"
   139→        inputs:
   140→          - network_configuration
   141→          - domain_requirements
   142→        outputs:
   143→          - ip_allocations
   144→          - dns_configuration
   145→          - ssl_certificate_requests
   146→
   147→  - stage: "infrastructure_provisioning"
   148→    name: "Infrastructure Provisioning"
   149→    agent: resource-agent
   150→    depends_on: resource_allocation
   151→    tasks:
   152→      - task: provision_virtual_machines
   153→        description: "Create and configure virtual machines"
   154→        inputs:
   155→          - reserved_resources
   156→          - vm_templates
   157→          - configuration_scripts
   158→        outputs:

file.content:
name: Infrastructure Setup Workflow
description: Comprehensive infrastructure provisioning and configuration for projects
version: "1.0.0"

metadata:
  workflow_id: infrastructure-setup
  category: infrastructure
  estimated_duration: "45-90 minutes"
  required_agents:
    - resource-agent
    - project-manager-agent
    - notion-agent
  optional_agents:
    - github-agent

trigger:
  command: "*provision-infrastructure"
  required_params:
    - project_id
    - infrastructure_type
  optional_params:
    - environment_type  # development, staging, production
    - scaling_requirements
    - compliance_requirements

variables:
  infrastructure_types:
    web_application:
      components:
        - web_servers: 2
        - database_server: 1
        - load_balancer: 1
        - cache_server: 1
      resources:
        web_server: { cpu: 2, ram: "4GB", storage: "50GB" }
        database_server: { cpu: 4, ram: "8GB", storage: "100GB" }
        load_balancer: { cpu: 1, ram: "2GB", storage: "20GB" }
        cache_server: { cpu: 2, ram: "4GB", storage: "30GB" }
    
    api_service:
      components:
        - api_servers: 3
        - database_server: 1
        - message_queue: 1
        - monitoring_stack: 1
      resources:
        api_server: { cpu: 2, ram: "2GB", storage: "30GB" }
        database_server: { cpu: 4, ram: "8GB", storage: "100GB" }
        message_queue: { cpu: 2, ram: "4GB", storage: "50GB" }
        monitoring_stack: { cpu: 2, ram: "4GB", storage: "100GB" }
    
    data_pipeline:
      components:
        - processing_nodes: 4
        - database_cluster: 3
        - storage_cluster: 1
        - scheduler: 1
      resources:
        processing_node: { cpu: 8, ram: "16GB", storage: "200GB" }
        database_node: { cpu: 4, ram: "8GB", storage: "500GB" }
        storage_cluster: { cpu: 2, ram: "4GB", storage: "2TB" }
        scheduler: { cpu: 2, ram: "4GB", storage: "50GB" }

stages:
  - stage: "requirements_analysis"
    name: "Infrastructure Requirements Analysis"
    agent: resource-agent
    tasks:
      - task: analyze_project_requirements
        description: "Analyze project needs and determine infrastructure specifications"
        inputs:
          - project_id
          - infrastructure_type
          - expected_load
          - compliance_requirements
        outputs:
          - infrastructure_specification
          - resource_requirements
          - cost_estimate
        
      - task: validate_resource_availability
        description: "Check availability of required resources"
        inputs:
          - resource_requirements
          - preferred_locations
        outputs:
          - availability_status
          - alternative_options
          - resource_constraints
        
      - task: create_architecture_design
        description: "Design infrastructure architecture and topology"
        inputs:
          - infrastructure_specification
          - availability_status
          - security_requirements
        outputs:
          - architecture_diagram
          - component_specifications
          - network_topology

  - stage: "resource_allocation"
    name: "Resource Allocation and Reservation"
    agent: resource-agent
    depends_on: requirements_analysis
    tasks:
      - task: reserve_compute_resources
        description: "Reserve virtual machines and containers"
        inputs:
          - component_specifications
          - resource_requirements
        outputs:
          - reserved_resources
          - resource_ids
          - allocation_confirmation
        
      - task: allocate_storage
        description: "Allocate and configure storage resources"
        inputs:
          - storage_requirements
          - backup_requirements
        outputs:
          - storage_allocations
          - storage_endpoints
          - backup_configuration
        
      - task: configure_networking
        description: "Set up network infrastructure and security groups"
        inputs:
          - network_topology
          - security_requirements
        outputs:
          - network_configuration
          - security_groups
          - firewall_rules
        
      - task: reserve_ip_addresses
        description: "Allocate IP addresses and configure DNS"
        inputs:
          - network_configuration
          - domain_requirements
        outputs:
          - ip_allocations
          - dns_configuration
          - ssl_certificate_requests

  - stage: "infrastructure_provisioning"
    name: "Infrastructure Provisioning"
    agent: resource-agent
    depends_on: resource_allocation
    tasks:
      - task: provision_virtual_machines
        description: "Create and configure virtual machines"
        inputs:
          - reserved_resources
          - vm_templates
          - configuration_scripts
        outputs:
          - vm_instances
          - vm_endpoints
          - access_credentials
        
      - task: setup_container_orchestration
        description: "Configure container orchestration platform"
        inputs:
          - container_requirements
          - orchestration_platform
        outputs:
          - orchestration_cluster
          - container_registry
          - deployment_pipelines
        condition:
          - infrastructure_type: ["api_service", "microservices"]
        
      - task: configure_databases
        description: "Set up and configure database systems"
        inputs:
          - database_requirements
          - backup_configuration
        outputs:
          - database_instances
          - database_endpoints
          - database_credentials
        
      - task: setup_load_balancers
        description: "Configure load balancers and traffic routing"
        inputs:
          - load_balancer_configuration
          - backend_servers
        outputs:
          - load_balancer_endpoints
          - traffic_routing_rules
          - health_check_configuration

  - stage: "security_hardening"
    name: "Security Configuration and Hardening"
    agent: resource-agent
    depends_on: infrastructure_provisioning
    tasks:
      - task: configure_firewalls
        description: "Set up firewall rules and network security"
        inputs:
          - security_requirements
          - network_configuration
        outputs:
          - firewall_configuration
          - security_policies
          - intrusion_detection
        
      - task: setup_ssl_certificates
        description: "Install and configure SSL certificates"
        inputs:
          - ssl_certificate_requests
          - domain_configuration
        outputs:
          - ssl_installation_status
          - certificate_renewal_schedule
        
      - task: configure_access_control
        description: "Set up user access control and authentication"
        inputs:
          - access_requirements
          - team_members
        outputs:
          - user_accounts
          - access_policies
          - authentication_configuration
        
      - task: enable_audit_logging
        description: "Configure audit logging and compliance monitoring"
        inputs:
          - compliance_requirements
          - logging_requirements
        outputs:
          - audit_configuration
          - log_aggregation_setup
          - compliance_monitoring

  - stage: "monitoring_setup"
    name: "Monitoring and Alerting Setup"
    agent: resource-agent
    depends_on: security_hardening
    tasks:
      - task: deploy_monitoring_stack
        description: "Deploy comprehensive monitoring solution"
        inputs:
          - monitoring_requirements
          - infrastructure_components
        outputs:
          - monitoring_endpoints
          - dashboard_urls
          - metric_collection_status
        
      - task: configure_alerting
        description: "Set up alerting rules and notification channels"
        inputs:
          - alert_requirements
          - escalation_procedures
        outputs:
          - alert_rules
          - notification_channels
          - escalation_configuration
        
      - task: setup_log_management
        description: "Configure centralized logging and analysis"
        inputs:
          - log_sources
          - retention_requirements
        outputs:
          - log_aggregation_endpoints
          - log_retention_policies
          - search_and_analysis_tools
        
      - task: implement_backup_monitoring
        description: "Set up backup monitoring and verification"
        inputs:
          - backup_configuration
          - recovery_requirements
        outputs:
          - backup_monitoring_status
          - recovery_test_schedule
          - backup_verification_reports

  - stage: "testing_and_validation"
    name: "Infrastructure Testing and Validation"
    agent: resource-agent
    depends_on: monitoring_setup
    tasks:
      - task: run_connectivity_tests
        description: "Test all network connections and endpoints"
        inputs:
          - network_configuration
          - service_endpoints
        outputs:
          - connectivity_test_results
          - network_performance_metrics
        
      - task: perform_security_testing
        description: "Execute security vulnerability scans"
        inputs:
          - security_configuration
          - vulnerability_scan_tools
        outputs:
          - security_scan_results
          - vulnerability_reports
          - remediation_recommendations
        
      - task: conduct_performance_testing
        description: "Test infrastructure performance and capacity"
        inputs:
          - performance_requirements
          - load_testing_scenarios
        outputs:
          - performance_test_results
          - capacity_analysis
          - optimization_recommendations
        
      - task: validate_backup_and_recovery
        description: "Test backup and disaster recovery procedures"
        inputs:
          - backup_configuration
          - recovery_procedures
        outputs:
          - backup_test_results
          - recovery_time_metrics
          - recovery_validation_report

  - stage: "documentation_and_handover"
    name: "Documentation and Team Handover"
    agent: project-manager-agent
    depends_on: testing_and_validation
    tasks:
      - task: generate_infrastructure_documentation
        description: "Create comprehensive infrastructure documentation"
        inputs:
          - architecture_diagram
          - component_specifications
          - configuration_details
        outputs:
          - infrastructure_documentation
          - operational_runbooks
          - troubleshooting_guides
        
      - task: create_access_documentation
        description: "Document access procedures and credentials"
        inputs:
          - access_credentials
          - security_procedures
        outputs:
          - access_documentation
          - credential_management_guide
          - security_procedures_document
        
      - task: update_notion_databases
        description: "Update Notion with infrastructure details"
        inputs:
          - project_id
          - infrastructure_details
          - resource_allocations
        outputs:
          - notion_updates
          - resource_database_entries
        
      - task: conduct_team_handover
        description: "Brief team on infrastructure setup and operations"
        inputs:
          - team_members
          - infrastructure_documentation
          - operational_procedures
        outputs:
          - handover_completion_status
          - team_training_records
          - knowledge_transfer_verification

success_criteria:
  infrastructure_provisioned:
    - all_resources_allocated: true
    - connectivity_verified: true
    - security_configured: true
    - monitoring_operational: true
  
  quality_gates:
    - security_scan_passed: true
    - performance_requirements_met: true
    - backup_procedures_validated: true
    - documentation_complete: true

rollback_procedures:
  resource_cleanup:
    - Deallocate all provisioned resources
    - Release IP addresses and DNS entries
    - Clean up security groups and firewall rules
    - Remove monitoring configurations
  
  cost_management:
    - Stop all billable resources
    - Release reserved capacity
    - Clean up storage allocations
    - Update cost tracking systems

error_handling:
  resource_provisioning_failure:
    action: "Retry with alternative resource pools"
    escalation: "Contact infrastructure team for manual intervention"
    
  security_validation_failure:
    action: "Block infrastructure activation until resolved"
    notification: "Alert security team and project manager"
    
  performance_test_failure:
    action: "Analyze and optimize configuration"
    fallback: "Scale resources to meet requirements"

monitoring_and_alerting:
  infrastructure_health:
    - Resource utilization monitoring
    - Service availability checks
    - Performance threshold monitoring
    - Security event monitoring
  
  cost_monitoring:
    - Resource usage tracking
    - Budget threshold alerts
    - Cost optimization recommendations
    - Usage trend analysis
  
  compliance_monitoring:
    - Security policy compliance
    - Audit log completeness
    - Access control validation
    - Data protection compliance

notifications:
  provisioning_start:
    recipients: [project_manager, infrastructure_team]
    message: "Infrastructure provisioning started for project {project_name}"
  
  stage_completion:
    recipients: [project_manager]
    message: "Completed {stage_name} for project {project_name}"
  
  infrastructure_ready:
    recipients: [project_team, stakeholders]
    message: "Infrastructure ready for project {project_name}"
    attachments: [access_documentation, operational_runbooks]
  
  provisioning_failure:
    recipients: [project_manager, infrastructure_team]
    message: "Infrastructure provisioning failed at {failed_stage}"
    attachments: [error_log, rollback_summary]

cost_management:
  budget_tracking:
    - Resource allocation costs
    - Operational expenses
    - Projected monthly costs
    - Cost per project component
  
  optimization_recommendations:
    - Right-sizing opportunities
    - Reserved instance potential
    - Storage optimization
    - Network efficiency improvements

content.text:
Looking at these workflows, I can see they're comprehensive but overly complex. Let's streamline them for practical use. Here's my analysis:

## Current Workflow Issues:

1. **Too many stages** - 6-8 stages per workflow creates unnecessary complexity
2. **Over-engineered** - Most users won't need all the detailed steps
3. **Notion integration scattered** - No clear, simple Notion workflow pattern
4. **Hard to follow** - Complex dependencies and conditions

## Simplified Workflow Strategy:

### 1. Project Initiation - Streamlined
```yaml
stages:
  - validation: Quick requirement check
  - notion_setup: Create project + initial tasks 
  - github_setup: Repo creation (if needed)
  - finalization: Link everything together
```

### 2. Development Cycle - Simplified  
```yaml
stages:
  - planning: Task breakdown in Notion
  - development: Code + update Notion progress
  - review: PR review + Notion status sync
  - deployment: Deploy + mark complete in Notion
```

### 3. Infrastructure Setup - Essential Only
```yaml
stages:
  - requirements: Determine what's needed
  - provision: Create resources
  - configure: Basic setup + monitoring
  - handover: Document in Notion
```

The key insight: **Notion should be the central hub** - everything flows through it, not complex multi-agent orchestration.

Want me to rewrite these as simple, practical workflows that actually work?

message.content: type out the six stages

content.text:
Looking at the current workflows, here are the **six core stages** that should drive all BRad Method workflows:

## The Six Universal Stages

### 1. **Planning**
- Gather requirements and validate inputs
- Break down work into actionable tasks
- Estimate effort and resources needed
- Set clear success criteria

### 2. **Setup** 
- Create Notion entries (projects, tasks, documentation)
- Initialize required resources (GitHub repos, infrastructure)
- Configure basic integrations and links
- Prepare working environment

### 3. **Execution**
- Perform the actual work (coding, provisioning, etc.)
- Update progress in real-time in Notion
- Follow established patterns and templates
- Maintain quality standards

### 4. **Validation**
- Test and verify work meets requirements
- Run quality checks and security scans
- Ensure integrations work properly
- Validate against success criteria

### 5. **Integration**
- Merge/deploy completed work
- Update all connected systems
- Sync status across Notion, GitHub, infrastructure
- Trigger downstream processes

### 6. **Completion**
- Mark tasks/projects as complete in Notion
- Generate reports and documentation
- Clean up temporary resources
- Notify stakeholders and hand over

---

**Key Principle**: Every workflow maps to these six stages, with Notion as the central tracking system. No more complex multi-stage workflows - just these six logical progression points that users can easily understand and follow.

message.content:
- validation: Quick requirement check make it semit detailed not crazy but don't want to miss anything.  
    - notion_setup: Create project + initial tasks we need to talk about this part , this is the only part i want to break out a little more. 
    - github_setup: Repo creation (if needed)
    - finalization: Link everything together\
\
these are my thoughts on this part of the workflow. \
link these up with thier agents and I am ok with this flow:\
  stages:
    - validation: Quick requirement check
    - notion_setup: Create project + initial tasks
    - github_setup: Repo creation (if needed)
    - finalization: Link everything together

  2. Development Cycle - Simplified

  stages:
    - planning: Task breakdown in Notion
    - development: Code + update Notion progress
    - review: PR review + Notion status sync
    - deployment: Deploy + mark complete in Notion

  3. Infrastructure Setup - Essential Only

  stages:
    - requirements: Determine what's needed
    - provision: Create resources
    - configure: Basic setup + monitoring
    - handover: Document in Notion\
\
see notes above.

toolUseResult.originalFile:
name: Project Initiation Workflow
description: Complete end-to-end project setup with Notion, GitHub, and resource provisioning
version: "1.0.0"

metadata:
  workflow_id: project-initiation
  category: project-management
  estimated_duration: "30-45 minutes"
  required_agents:
    - project-manager-agent
    - notion-agent
    - github-agent
    - resource-agent
  
trigger:
  command: "*create-project"
  required_params:
    - project_type
  optional_params:
    - project_name
    - description
    - team_members

stages:
  - stage: "validation"
    name: "Project Requirements Validation"
    agent: project-manager-agent
    tasks:
      - task: validate_project_requirements
        description: "Validate and gather complete project requirements"
        inputs:
          - project_type
          - project_name
          - description
          - team_members
          - infrastructure_needs
        outputs:
          - validated_requirements
          - project_scope
        error_handling:
          - missing_requirements: "Prompt user for missing information"
          - invalid_type: "Show available project types"
    
  - stage: "notion_setup"
    name: "Notion Database Setup"
    agent: notion-agent
    depends_on: validation
    tasks:
      - task: create_project_entry
        description: "Create project in Notion Projects database"
        inputs:
          - validated_requirements
        outputs:
          - project_id
          - notion_project_url
        
      - task: generate_initial_tasks
        description: "Create initial task breakdown based on project type"
        inputs:
          - project_id
          - project_type
        outputs:
          - task_list
          - task_ids
        
      - task: create_project_documentation
        description: "Create initial project documentation in Notes database"
        inputs:
          - project_id
          - project_scope
        outputs:
          - documentation_id
          - documentation_url

  - stage: "github_setup"
    name: "GitHub Repository Setup"
    agent: github-agent
    depends_on: notion_setup
    condition:
      - github_repo_requested: true
    tasks:
      - task: create_repository
        description: "Create GitHub repository with proper template"
        inputs:
          - project_name
          - project_type
          - description
        outputs:
          - repository_url
          - repository_id
        
      - task: setup_repository_structure
        description: "Initialize repository with template structure"
        inputs:
          - repository_id
          - project_type
        outputs:
          - initial_commit_hash
          - branch_structure
        
      - task: configure_repository_settings
        description: "Set up branch protection, workflows, and integrations"
        inputs:
          - repository_id
        outputs:
          - protection_rules
          - workflow_files
        
      - task: clone_local_repository
        description: "Clone repository to local development environment"
        inputs:
          - repository_url
          - project_name
        outputs:
          - local_path
          - clone_status

  - stage: "resource_provisioning"
    name: "Infrastructure Resource Provisioning"
    agent: resource-agent
    depends_on: notion_setup
    condition:
      - infrastructure_required: true
    tasks:
      - task: assess_resource_requirements
        description: "Analyze infrastructure needs based on project type"
        inputs:
          - project_type
          - infrastructure_needs
          - team_size
        outputs:
          - resource_specification
          - estimated_costs
        
      - task: allocate_resources
        description: "Provision required infrastructure resources"
        inputs:
          - resource_specification
          - project_id
        outputs:
          - allocated_resources
          - resource_endpoints
          - access_credentials
        
      - task: configure_networking
        description: "Set up networking and security for allocated resources"
        inputs:
          - allocated_resources
          - project_security_requirements
        outputs:
          - network_configuration
          - security_settings
        
      - task: setup_monitoring
        description: "Configure monitoring and alerting for resources"
        inputs:
          - allocated_resources
        outputs:
          - monitoring_endpoints
          - alert_configurations

  - stage: "integration"
    name: "Cross-System Integration"
    agent: project-manager-agent
    depends_on: 
      - notion_setup
      - github_setup
      - resource_provisioning
    tasks:
      - task: link_systems
        description: "Create bidirectional links between Notion, GitHub, and resources"
        inputs:
          - project_id
          - repository_url
          - allocated_resources
        outputs:
          - integration_status
          - sync_configuration
        
      - task: setup_automation
        description: "Configure hooks and automation between systems"
        inputs:
          - project_id
          - repository_id
          - allocated_resources
        outputs:
          - hook_configurations
          - automation_status
        
      - task: validate_integration
        description: "Test all integrations and automations"
        inputs:
          - integration_status
          - hook_configurations
        outputs:
          - validation_results
          - integration_health

  - stage: "finalization"
    name: "Project Finalization"
    agent: project-manager-agent
    depends_on: integration
    tasks:
      - task: generate_project_summary
        description: "Create comprehensive project setup summary"
        inputs:
          - project_id
          - notion_project_url
          - repository_url
          - allocated_resources
          - task_list
        outputs:
          - project_summary
          - access_information
          - next_steps
        
      - task: notify_stakeholders
        description: "Send project setup notifications to team members"
        inputs:
          - team_members
          - project_summary
          - access_information
        outputs:
          - notification_status
        
      - task: schedule_kickoff
        description: "Schedule project kickoff meeting and initial planning session"
        inputs:
          - team_members
          - project_timeline
        outputs:
          - kickoff_meeting
          - planning_session

success_criteria:
  - notion_project_created: true
  - github_repository_created: true
  - resources_allocated: true
  - integrations_configured: true
  - team_notified: true

rollback_procedures:
  notion_rollback:
    - Delete created project entry
    - Remove generated tasks
    - Clean up project documentation
  
  github_rollback:
    - Delete created repository
    - Clean up local clone
    - Remove webhook configurations
  
  resource_rollback:
    - Deallocate provisioned resources
    - Clean up network configurations
    - Remove monitoring setup

error_handling:
  agent_failure:
    action: "Continue with other stages, mark failed stage for retry"
    max_retries: 3
    escalation: "Notify project manager for manual intervention"
  
  resource_shortage:
    action: "Queue project for later provisioning"
    notification: "Inform user of delay and expected availability"
  
  integration_failure:
    action: "Complete individual setups, flag integration for manual setup"
    fallback: "Provide manual integration instructions"

monitoring:
  workflow_progress:
    - Stage completion percentage
    - Task execution time
    - Error occurrences
    - Resource utilization
  
  success_metrics:
    - Time to project creation
    - Integration success rate
    - User satisfaction score
    - Resource allocation efficiency

notifications:
  workflow_start:
    recipients: [user, project_manager]
    message: "Project initiation workflow started for {project_name}"
  
  stage_completion:
    recipients: [user]
    message: "Completed {stage_name} for project {project_name}"
  
  workflow_completion:
    recipients: [user, team_members, project_manager]
    message: "Project {project_name} successfully initialized"
    attachments: [project_summary, access_information]
  
  workflow_failure:
    recipients: [user, project_manager]
    message: "Project initiation failed at {failed_stage}"
    attachments: [error_log, rollback_summary]

          - dependency_chains: "Establish task dependency relationships"

toolUseResult.originalFile:
name: Project Initiation Workflow
description: Streamlined end-to-end project setup with Notion, GitHub, and resource provisioning
version: "2.0.0"

metadata:
  workflow_id: project-initiation
  category: project-management
  estimated_duration: "15-30 minutes"
  required_agents:
    - project-manager-agent
    - notion-agent
    - github-agent
  
trigger:
  command: "*create-project"
  required_params:
    - project_type
  optional_params:
    - project_name
    - description
    - team_members

stages:
  - stage: "validation"
    name: "Quick Requirements Check"
    agent: project-manager-agent
    description: "Semi-detailed validation to ensure we have everything needed"
    tasks:
      - task: validate_core_requirements
        description: "Check essential project parameters"
        inputs:
          - project_type
          - project_name
          - description
        outputs:
          - validated_requirements
          - project_scope
        validation_checks:
          - project_type_exists: "Verify project type is supported (web-app, api-service, data-pipeline, infrastructure)"
          - name_availability: "Check project name availability in GitHub org and Notion"
          - description_quality: "Ensure description is clear and actionable"
          - resource_feasibility: "Quick check if infrastructure requirements are reasonable"
        
      - task: gather_optional_details
        description: "Collect additional project details if not provided"
        inputs:
          - team_members
          - budget_constraints
          - timeline_requirements
          - compliance_needs
        outputs:
          - complete_requirements
          - planning_parameters
        prompts:
          - team_assignment: "Who should be assigned to this project?"
          - infrastructure_needs: "Will this project need dedicated infrastructure?"
          - integration_requirements: "Any specific integrations or external dependencies?"
    
  - stage: "notion_setup"
    name: "Notion Database Setup"
    agent: notion-agent
    depends_on: validation
    tasks:
      - task: create_project_entry
        description: "Create project in Notion Projects database"
        inputs:
          - validated_requirements
        outputs:
          - project_id
          - notion_project_url
        
      - task: generate_initial_tasks
        description: "Create initial task breakdown based on project type"
        inputs:
          - project_id
          - project_type
        outputs:
          - task_list
          - task_ids
        
      - task: create_project_documentation
        description: "Create initial project documentation in Notes database"
        inputs:
          - project_id
          - project_scope
        outputs:
          - documentation_id
          - documentation_url

  - stage: "github_setup"
    name: "GitHub Repository Setup"
    agent: github-agent
    depends_on: notion_setup
    condition:
      - github_repo_requested: true
    tasks:
      - task: create_repository
        description: "Create GitHub repository with proper template"
        inputs:
          - project_name
          - project_type
          - description
        outputs:
          - repository_url
          - repository_id
        
      - task: setup_repository_structure
        description: "Initialize repository with template structure"
        inputs:
          - repository_id
          - project_type
        outputs:
          - initial_commit_hash
          - branch_structure
        
      - task: configure_repository_settings
        description: "Set up branch protection, workflows, and integrations"
        inputs:
          - repository_id
        outputs:
          - protection_rules
          - workflow_files
        
      - task: clone_local_repository
        description: "Clone repository to local development environment"
        inputs:
          - repository_url
          - project_name
        outputs:
          - local_path
          - clone_status

  - stage: "resource_provisioning"
    name: "Infrastructure Resource Provisioning"
    agent: resource-agent
    depends_on: notion_setup
    condition:
      - infrastructure_required: true
    tasks:
      - task: assess_resource_requirements
        description: "Analyze infrastructure needs based on project type"
        inputs:
          - project_type
          - infrastructure_needs
          - team_size
        outputs:
          - resource_specification
          - estimated_costs
        
      - task: allocate_resources
        description: "Provision required infrastructure resources"
        inputs:
          - resource_specification
          - project_id
        outputs:
          - allocated_resources
          - resource_endpoints
          - access_credentials
        
      - task: configure_networking
        description: "Set up networking and security for allocated resources"
        inputs:
          - allocated_resources
          - project_security_requirements
        outputs:
          - network_configuration
          - security_settings
        
      - task: setup_monitoring
        description: "Configure monitoring and alerting for resources"
        inputs:
          - allocated_resources
        outputs:
          - monitoring_endpoints
          - alert_configurations

  - stage: "integration"
    name: "Cross-System Integration"
    agent: project-manager-agent
    depends_on: 
      - notion_setup
      - github_setup
      - resource_provisioning
    tasks:
      - task: link_systems
        description: "Create bidirectional links between Notion, GitHub, and resources"
        inputs:
          - project_id
          - repository_url
          - allocated_resources
        outputs:
          - integration_status
          - sync_configuration
        
      - task: setup_automation
        description: "Configure hooks and automation between systems"
        inputs:
          - project_id
          - repository_id
          - allocated_resources
        outputs:
          - hook_configurations
          - automation_status
        
      - task: validate_integration
        description: "Test all integrations and automations"
        inputs:
          - integration_status
          - hook_configurations
        outputs:
          - validation_results
          - integration_health

  - stage: "finalization"
    name: "Project Finalization"
    agent: project-manager-agent
    depends_on: integration
    tasks:
      - task: generate_project_summary
        description: "Create comprehensive project setup summary"
        inputs:
          - project_id
          - notion_project_url
          - repository_url
          - allocated_resources
          - task_list
        outputs:
          - project_summary
          - access_information
          - next_steps
        
      - task: notify_stakeholders
        description: "Send project setup notifications to team members"
        inputs:
          - team_members
          - project_summary
          - access_information
        outputs:
          - notification_status
        
      - task: schedule_kickoff
        description: "Schedule project kickoff meeting and initial planning session"
        inputs:
          - team_members
          - project_timeline
        outputs:
          - kickoff_meeting
          - planning_session

success_criteria:
  - notion_project_created: true
  - github_repository_created: true
  - resources_allocated: true
  - integrations_configured: true
  - team_notified: true

rollback_procedures:
  notion_rollback:
    - Delete created project entry
    - Remove generated tasks
    - Clean up project documentation
  
  github_rollback:
    - Delete created repository
    - Clean up local clone
    - Remove webhook configurations
  
  resource_rollback:
    - Deallocate provisioned resources
    - Clean up network configurations
    - Remove monitoring setup

error_handling:
  agent_failure:
    action: "Continue with other stages, mark failed stage for retry"
    max_retries: 3
    escalation: "Notify project manager for manual intervention"
  
  resource_shortage:
    action: "Queue project for later provisioning"
    notification: "Inform user of delay and expected availability"
  
  integration_failure:
    action: "Complete individual setups, flag integration for manual setup"
    fallback: "Provide manual integration instructions"

monitoring:
  workflow_progress:
    - Stage completion percentage
    - Task execution time
    - Error occurrences
    - Resource utilization
  
  success_metrics:
    - Time to project creation
    - Integration success rate
    - User satisfaction score
    - Resource allocation efficiency

notifications:
  workflow_start:
    recipients: [user, project_manager]
    message: "Project initiation workflow started for {project_name}"
  
  stage_completion:
    recipients: [user]
    message: "Completed {stage_name} for project {project_name}"
  
  workflow_completion:
    recipients: [user, team_members, project_manager]
    message: "Project {project_name} successfully initialized"
    attachments: [project_summary, access_information]
  
  workflow_failure:
    recipients: [user, project_manager]
    message: "Project initiation failed at {failed_stage}"
    attachments: [error_log, rollback_summary]
